original_text: The people of Israel walked in all the sins that Jeroboam did. They did not depart from them,
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여로보암이 행한 모든 죄를 따라 행하여 거기서 떠나지 아니하므로

sentences.original_text: The people of Israel walked in all the sins
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성은 모든 죄 가운데 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: They did not depart from them,
